reviews.text: It's a shrine of famous saint in Islam "Abdullah Shah Ghazi" many people comes daily to pray (fateha) for him. Most of the people who comes here believe that their wishes become true due to faith in the blessings of saint.
It is a nice place where Phatan lives in majority. You can find a room here in very low cost about 3000PKR Pakistani currency for a month on rent.
I love to sit on shirne, that's the place where u can sit or Earth and no one will ask why u r sitting like this
It is one of very peaceful place in Karachi. It is really nice to visit it early in the morning.
I'm not define, no comment ..... Shrine of Hazrat Abdullah Shah Gazi. Very rehamt o barkat, faiz o fazail place..

Other than being a spectacular colonial-era building, the Hindu Gymkhana is a sporty social club. It also hosts NAPA, or the National Academy of Performing Arts, an art school that also showcases plays for wider audiences. Check it out, whether it’s for a cup of tea in a vintage atmosphere or to attend a mesmerizing drama performance
Great ambiance. Fantastic building. Will go back for sure.
This building has been repurposed into the building for the National Academy of Performing Arts. The building is old and antique and beautiful

It's now National  Academy of Performing Art and wow what a place it is. If you wanna learn acting or music in karachi than guys this is the place... I have spend 1.5 year here.... Just love this place 100/10

This building now is napa.national act of performing arts.in here on festival and daily or weekly basis theatre show available and in here university of napa.napa university helps to increase students skill in arts acting,singing,theatre artist story telling and many napa students are working in our Pakistan film and drama industry lollywood
Nice but very simple. Good tour with a deacon!
Nice looking cathedral.

Although it's clearly free for people to walk the grounds of this church, I was approached and escorted to a ticket office by a staff member. The office asked for 200birr! I told them I didn't want to go inside the cathedral and they said I still had to pay or I had to leave. The place had dozens of people walking the grounds who I highly doubt paid 200birr. Still I left the grounds. Even after exiting I was reprimanded by a guard for standing on the street near the cathedral. I'm used to getting foreigner prices,  but this is ridiculous.
Must visit in Addis. Better with guide for more interesting stories
Amazing design and painted windows, great hospitality
This historical building which known for the office of Karachi metropolitan corporation office. Also the office of mayor Karachi and the city council sessions held here.
It's one of the magnificent building in Karachi situated at M A jinnah road its a national Heritage. Nice lush green garden on front

Historic building in Karachi very beautiful architect 
Now this building used as a Karachi metropolitan corporation office 
Attractive place
It is a beautiful architect a treat to watch. I was just passing by when i took this photo for google map ...

Nice looking building, symbol of our heritage.
May Allah make it fruitful and beneficial for the people of Karachi

It is a great museum that's extremely easy on the wallet as well.  Rs. 30 entry with no time limit. Once you're done with the exhibitions, you can hang out in the garden (which is beautiful and very well maintained!) 
You have to turn in your cell phones when you go see the exhibit inside.

The air conditioning is great which keeps the exhibits safe. The staff is very polite and helpful. 

There's a cute little gift shop. But beware, the staff that runs it takes really long breaks.

reviews.author_name: Syed Salman Mehdi Kazmi Mosvi Mush'hadi
reviews.text:
Its nice place to visit.  Specially museum. The building architecture is great.  Some of the best maintained historical places in Pakistan. 
I love visiting. Karachi is greater than I thought for learning its heritage culture and tradions which absorbed by this big city.

A mushaira was arranged. The Mohatta Palace itself and its ground are regal indeed albeit at a smaller scale. Karachi evenings are famously known for cool sea breeze. So the environment was magical and magnificent as the event coverage equipment was professional-included drone camera coverage.

It is a nice place to visit. You can go there very easily through different ways of transportation. There are many beautiful things u will see there. They are quiet clean and neat. staff are really helpful. They do have a knowledge about mohatta palace.  Please visit and enjoy your tour with them.

This place is good, and can become more good as well, in needs improvement that the authorities doesn't allow anyone to capture the shots of Palace inside even the don't let students to capture...

As for about the Palace, that is wonderful if I would say an apple of my eye!

No doubt that is!

Amazing place

Very nice and historical place. One of the must see point of interest in Karachi. Very informative place. We should must go here with kids for awareness of young generation. Nice and clean place very beautiful building and lawns. Staff is also cooperative. Water showers are not running i think it is because of shortage of water in our country

One of the greatest leaders in the history.Muhammad Ali Jinnah was the best leader of his time. We find no match of him at that time in entire world. Most brave personality who was absolutely followed his rules. He set examples to the whole world which can be followed for centuries. Never ever compromised over his rules, nor deviated even an inch from the truth.

This is history of the maker of this country. Loved the place only because of that.
There's literally no management and no grass for a cooler environment. That needs to be improved.
NOTE: Bags and Cameras are not allowed, leave them at home!

This is the Tomb of the great leader and founder father of Islamic Republic of Pakistan. Located in the heart of the mega city Karachi. A very beautiful constructions around the Tomb and fountains increasing its beauty.  Worth visiting it.
Historic place. Re energize the spirit and gives proud feelings. Gratitude for the man who led us to freedom
One of the Finest Infrastructure interms of Parking Capacity, Proper Green Area And Grand Flooring for court.
Good construction form British era but justice is too far.
Suhno shar Vs. State cr.misc. app|.new.234  of 2019

It's highly not understandable that in courts thousands of cases are pending and every year honorable judges go to annual summer vacation. How funny it is.
They are not school 🏫 children. 
They are Judges.
I strongly suggest that these stupid summer vacation should immediately be abolished
A beautiful building with lot of attractions. High court of the Sindh province of Pakistan.
Biggest Cross sign in Asia... Located in Gora Qabrustan (Christian community graveyard ) Karachi.

Christian Pakistani businessman Parvez Henry Gill has build a 140-foot cross at the Gora Qabristan Cemetery. Following a dream in which Gill claims to have seen God asking him to do something for the Christian community four years ago, he, in due course, decided to build Asia’s largest cross in the 90 per cent Muslim country.

the largest cross sign of asia continent built in entrance of gora qabristan (christian graveyard) in karachi,  This shows karachi is the most religiously tolerant city of Pakistan. Christians, Hindus, Jews, Parsis and Muslims all are welcome in Karachi.
Said to be asia's largest cross. And located on the entrance of the famous gora qabristan. (Christian's graveyard).
It's Christian graveyard where cross sign of there religion is made and is of 2nd highest cross in Pakistan.

This place is awesome. Worth visiting place. Very neat and clean. Thanks PAF management for keeping it in good condition. Its best managed and most beautiful with lush green wide areas. Its most beautiful park in Karachi. Only family can visit it but I suggest that one day in a week should be for singles/without family for enjoyment of guys who are living without family in Karachi.

An Air Force Museum with lots of old jets that have remained in operation since independence of Pakistan. Also, exhibits enemy jet trophies. Details of each item and history are well maintained. Pictures and dummies of air Force uniform. There are various children activities with fun. Tickets range from Rs. 60-100. Many airforce related gifts are available to purchase. Great place to visit.

Great place to bring your family special kids because this place brings entertainment, fun and education at one place and it is very important for children to visit this place to learn about our air Force and its history and it is also very relaxing at the same time for the whole family. Just one request as it is run by the military it is very clean and tidy so we should respect the rules specially about throwing trash because I have scene people throwing everything on the ground while dustbin is two step away from them they don't even bother to throw it in the dustbin I was very this disappointed to see that. What type of message are there giving to there children who are watching them and learning from there elders.

A very good informative place for kids to visit. Ace School yearly arrange a trip to PAF museum. The best part that they have placed information of every aircraft so if any does not know about it can read from there easily. The management also very supportive.

Amazing place to visit with children. Kids enjoyed looking at all the planes. Loved hearing all the stories written and put on show inside the museum building. An amusement park/ride section topped off the afternoon. Good, clean, well maintained. Only families allowed and kids under 4 were free! Very inspirational for the whole family.

Went there as a kid.. It was good when there was lack of info, but these days kids know more than what is told there. local governement should invest and make it into better attraction probably install some high powered telescopes, something kids dont have access to.
A very interesting and informative place for young kids

Horrible experience. How can filth, dirt, rust be showcased and charged as a service? Disgusting is a small word. This place as it is, should be hidden from public in shame, let alone exhibited on a paid ticket. Unbelievable!!!

Visited long time back. Watched the show about stars in the hall with dome shaped roof. Body of a condemned aeroplane was also there & people could see it from inside on ticket. Despite central location there was not much rush of visitors. I agree with other reviewers that this huge plot should be developed into a wonderful educational entertainment spot for general public (particularly kids) with minimum commercialization. Please please.. Don't ever sell it to private builder mafia. It should be in custody of provincial government for public use.
Good for Students and young learners

Birth place of Muhammad Ali jinah fonder of Islamic Republic of Pakistan. A great nation of world . May Allah bless on this country and save from enemies of Islam best army of the world loving people love you all from Saudi Arabia Pakistan is best country of the world

Historic place holding the glimpses from the pages of history. Birth place of founder of the nation Qaide e Azam Muhammad Ali Jinnah. Holding many personal items and memories of the greatest leader of sub continent. What a place it is.
Great place. A must visit place for those who love Quaid e Azam Muhammad Ali Jinnah.

Wazir Mansion known officially as Quaid-i-Azam Birthplace Museum is a former family home in the Kharadar district of Karachi, Sindh, Pakistan which is considered the birthplace of the country's founder, Muhammad Ali Jinnah. I really loved this place from inside where you get glimses of our Great Quaid e Azam all over the place. However, camera usage is not allowed inside the museum area. But you return with so many memories
Birth Place of The Great Leader of Pakistan  Quaid e Azam M.A Jinnah
Should have government machinery to travel, travelling isn't good or safe. Visit is suggested
Lovely beach when it comes to picnic but is under developed so it’s better to take necessities with you.
Best area to see Pakistani marchent navy ship yard and deep and clean see view. You can enjoy travel via ship and ride on horse and camel. Just 100 rupee ticket to manora beach

This is an excellent point to view the ocean. But there is a lot of caution in this side. Avoiding swimming in the sea, because the ocean begins to become deeper nearer. And the risk of sinking continues. If there is a choice of water in the ocean water, instead of this strip, choose a cliffton or sea view, then why there is less danger of sinking in water because the ocean is deeper after going ahead.
Great place... Better than clifton... At least little better clean place....

nice place. you can go with your family . management are highly co operative .
BUT BUT BUT.....!
stay away from  Valley Parking..
They are non professionals and can steel tour petrol and harm your car deliberately . in order to make money.
I AM HIGHLY RECOMMEND THAT PLEASE PARK YOUR CAR BY YOUR OWN SELF IN PARKING

Port Grand is one of the finest developments that celebrates the city of Karachi with diverse concepts in food, art, leisure, entertainment, adventure, fun and shopping, A cultural hub on Pakistan’s Seaport, celebrations at Port Grand are a truly delightful experience! A great place to spend an evening with family or friends.Nice port with great walk.Ships and port activity was also visible.Good food served in restaurants.There was a temple too in the basement.Scenic view.No bad smell as in sea view.The washrooms were clean. Opens in evening till late night.One needs to buy a ticket which is adjusted in the amount consumed in lovely food chains. On working days the Rush is less and one can take a nice walk in the area where we enjoyed the Ships standing and container train moving beside us too. Awesome to see sunset sitting on one of the benches, watching ships, horizon, birds.And above all sea. Nice and affordable street type food as well as expensive restaurants.

Thought I have already posted a review about this place on my blog but this is one great option for people to relax themselves.. amazing spot for families to have some food or for kids to cycle, play games and having a nice evening walk. You will find few shops and art galleries here too..
Had a wonderful time with family. Enjoyed the musical evening, performance from various local singers was nice. Kids loved it too. The food stalls were great and loved the live ice cream stalls!

A very nice and must go place for family entertainment.

All kind of restaurants are there alongside children amusement and fun. 

Speed Boats also available for thrill.

Its a good destination for visiting either with a family or alone for morning, afternoon and evening timings. It offers large grassy space, long walking track, good city view, fresh air, delicious food, coffee, tea, BBQ, children rides, beautiful funland and much more. Most importantly, it is very cheap in terms of ticket prices.

Hill Park. A very beautiful and Fascinating place to visit and enjoy. Hill park is situated at the top of a hill , from this park you can easily get a beautiful voew of full Karachi City.

Very Beautiful scenery and sunsets can be captured. Best for Photography and Shoots.
Big place and no worries
Good Place to Visit. Good Spot for Couples and Family Time. Very Good Venue for Photography. Excellent Cityscape for Karachi.

Superb place for kids. Hill climbing is an adventure and fun for your family to watch high rises buildings of Karachi from the Top. Rates of children electronic swings are cheap than other amusement parks.
Nice park for family. It can be maintained well to serve its purpose.
It is very much suitable place for fun with family huge open air area allow younger to move around freely  it is extremely family friend place with security.and this place has lush green lawn.
Superb very nice faimly park.
Well maintained and affordable for all
Family entertainment
Nice family Park
It's not good, not the food, nor the place.. other branches are good, specifically malir and khadda market wali are best for food and ambiance is sophisticated as well

They have some good food in their menu ..situated in diffrent areas of Karachi ...staff is very cooprative ....their prices are very economical .....as mentioned earlier food is good ...I like their fish and chips ...garlic mayo roll. ...shahi paneeri hand I.another handi  which I am forgetting right now ....mutton Karachi....and their salads are amazing .....Enjoy dining @ hot n spicy
Love the chicken tikkas. Nice little place to sit for a comfortable and reasonable meal.
All time favorite food. Pioneer in paratha roll and fast food.

Nice location.
Food quality is good
Seating arrangement is satisfactory.
Quality of food is good
Rolls are famous.

Students Biryani was the one of the most delicious mouth watering popular and well known Biryani of karachi city of its time  but as they build the new dining area and add much more food variety with Biryani like Fast Food Pizza B.B.Q But problem is they fail to maintain the taste of their Biryani and they are losing taste day by day and their rates are more expensive as compare to the other Restaurants
Bht he bura taste tha aaj k biryani ka. I am eating this biryani for last 2q years and today it was worst.
A very famous. student biryani centre in Karachi saddar
Ok on contemporary... Down rating down 👇🏻
They used to be good but they really lost the thing. No more good biryani.

Giving it 4 Stars as this place has been one of our favourites for almost 2 decades. However, there seems to be a problem with their buffet Sea Fiesta annual promotion. Last year, one of our party got food poisoning after eating the buffet. This year (2019), two people got severe food poisoning and a third had a bad stomach after eating the buffet! There won't be a 3rd time as we'll avoid the buffet at this place. 
However, stick to the items on the menu and we've never had issues with any of the dishes. I'd guess because they're cooked to order! 
Notwithstanding the issues with the buffet, this is still one of the best places to eat. Extremely busy in the evenings. 
Used to love sitting outside, wish they'd be allowed to bring the outside seating back.

One of the best managed and popular restaurant in Karachi. Quality of food is excellent. Famous for Bar B.Q items but other items are also delicious. Staff are courteous. Cutlery and crockery are good. Prices are affordable compare to all surrounding area.
4 Star: Sitting chairs were more comfortable in the past.
Pro tip: Always try to make a reservation at Roof top. You can call them as late as 1 hour before your visit.

Indeed this is the best restaurant for desi food in town. One of the oldest and best food option available in Karachi. Specially known for large family and friends gatherings. Food quality is extremely good. It is always crowded but they try very hard to keep the service quick and good, and most of the time they succeed as well. Multiple floor indoor and rooftop outdoor dining area available. Wallet parking is available. Cash and card both accepted as payment options. They also have take away and home delivery services.

The place is good. Cannot think of any other words to describe it. So yea, just plain good. Been there several times but still feel there's something missing. Can't decide what. Though, loved the brunch! You won't be wrong if you are planning to treat the loved ones, friends or colleague etc. Can't say if they offer the best food.

One of the best managed  and popular restaurant in Karachi. Quality of food is excellent. Famous for Bar B.Q items but other items are also delicious. Staff are courteous. Cutlery and crockery are good. Prices are affordable compare to all surrounding area.

The food is awful, the chips are over cooked. The meat is cheap and not cooked in the sauces. The sweet and sour does not taste like any sweet and sour I have ever had it has a mildly unpleasant flavour
The worst Chinese food I've ever tried to eat.. tatesless and way over cooked. Chicken was hard, curry sauce was terrible.. the duck spring rolls were worst thing I've ever tasted.

Ordered a chicken noodles and beef fried rice with pot of curry sauce...... can safely say it was a huge mistake ordering from this place.... chicken actually tasted like it was off the noodles somehow where chewy and the curry sauce was a pure taste of salt!! Chinese has to be my favourite food but 100% this was the worst I have had!!

This was absolutely awful and by far the worst chinese I have ever had. We tried China town for the first time 6 months ago and were disappointed. We thought we would give them one more go. I'm not a fussy eater, but this was inedible. I couldn't even tell what the meat was suppose to be.

Decided to try Chinatown Takeaway because the other local Chinese takeaway was closed... Error!! Not only are the portion sizes much smaller and the quality a lot lower but, they also messed up the order by forgetting to deliver an item. The delivery chap returned with the missed item & then came back a third time claiming we hadn't paid for it..! Upon calling the Chinatown takeaway, they admitted fault but still expected us to pay the "debt collector" they had sent to our door! Avoid Chinatown and got to Beijing Paradise, it's much better all round!!
Excellent place, great good and friendly staff. Dynamite prawns are the best. Will definitely visit again. Quality of food 9/10 , Service 9/10, cleanliness 9/10
The food was good. Though they have "localized" the flavors by adding loads of spices to everything. So caution is advised on that side. The service is excellent.
Ambience was nice. Good service. Taste was also good. Quantity of food was more than I expected it to be. So another positive aspect

Ordered at 9:55 through there App after 1 hour for waiting at 11:00 I called them and after waiting for so long a looser picked up the phone and informed me that confirmation call was placed on my phone which was not attended. A big lie from that looser because phone was with me all the time and I never received the call from Ginsoy then he told me that I am confirming your order now and your will receive your food in next 60 mins so that would be like 12 what rubbish. Never gonna order again from these bunch of unprofessionals.
Great food, but the people standing and looking at you while you are eating is really disconcerting. Insist on a table upstairs. Don't sit downstairs under any condition or for any reason.

Came to this place after 3 or 4 years to eat my favorite Chicken Tarragon. The taste was similar to what I remembered, ambience good, staff was courteous,  food came on time and hot... Thank you for helping me relive the good memories of Karachi and Pakistan.

My Personal Favorite! Roasters provides cozy ambiance, yet a very formal setting. To top it all, the food, specially stakes are great. A little pricey, but not way out of the league. I like to take my guest there for dinner, whether business or otherwise formal. Also when I want to eat a good stake with my family.

An ever green place. Great ambiance, comfy seating with TV to watch sports matches (if any) and to top it all, great food.

I am addicted to their burgers. I can say that their mouth full beef burgers are as good as any in town.

In general, they are famous for their steaks. They have good nice ambience and overall setup. Prices are higher but you can avail 50% off on your second main course. I visited this branch for the first time on this weekend. Food taste was good but not as good as their PECHS sibling. Service was excellent.

Ideal ideal place to have the nicest of company of good food. 
Taragon steak was just like how it should be.
Chicken burger was big juicy fresh and amazing.
Both drinks were delicious.
Will recommend everybody to go and have a nice time as the ambience is great too.

Good food. No innovation or change in ambiance with the passage of time. Place looks tired now. We ordered tea and the staff told us they don't serve it. Found that strange. Also they they put in 2 extra entree's in our bill. So do check your bills b 4 paying.

It used to be such a nice place a few years ago but it has lost its touch. Still, if you want to have a decent get together somewhere around Hassan square, this is a nice space. Choose the menu wisely though. Some dishes tend to be bland.

The restaurant is clean and tidy when it comes to the dining area. But the furniture is decades old. The ambiance needs to be changed after so many years. 
The attitude of the staff and management needs to be a bit humble and professional. 
Prices of the food needs to be reviewed since they are on a bit higher side. Speaking of prices, I was shocked when I was charged tax amount extra when I paid for some takeaway food. Which means that there is a difference in payment amount if you pay cash than through your credit card.
Strange.

Usmania Restaurant has this special pulao dish which is a must eat if you visit Karachi. Sitting arrangements are good and the environment is neat and clean. There is a good variety of Desi food and you will surely visit this place again once you develop their taste. You can bring your family and kids here to have healthy food. There are parking issues so be mentally prepared.
It used to be the best place with some delicious food. Except toothy Fruity ice cream nothing is good there. Not recommended. at all only for ice cream
Excellent taste. Superb environment. Variety was also good for buffet but could be made better. But overall great place to be.
Average food quality. Service is slow and quality varies on daily basis. Also 2500 Rs/head is too much high cost.
Good quality food but not much tasty with limited foods variety. It s a dmall gathering place with love music. View from window is spectacular though.

This is a thematic restaurant serving exclusively Pakistani food. It's located on the tenth floor. There is an exclusive lift for this restaurant. Views from the tenth floor are very nice.  

Diverse range of food including live BBQ station and live music. I tried the salads, chicken, rice and fish. Every item was tasty and served hot. Dessert corner had many option which I don't even recall but there were around 12 items to sample on this station.

Overall a nice experience. Please note this is a high-end restaurant located inside PC so the bill will be on the higher side. I had lunch at this place three times and every time the experience was great. Menu also changes every day with variations in the salads, main course and deserts
The food was good with a vast variety of dishes. The taste was very authentic.

Good and fast service. Fried spring rolls and fried wanton great for starters. Various soup are very tasty. Main course with fried seafood noodles n fried rice with ginger chicken, fried fish and stir fried vege are perfect. Fanciful names for Ice cream for dessert are fabulous. Crab claws is a must have item.
Not an ordinary Chinese restaurant. Crab claws, vegetable wanton, roast pork with pepper, some of the must-try dishes.  One of the few family restaurants which serves alcohol.
I am visiting this Chinese for about 35 years.. the same taste exists... till date... Try the Crab Claws & Crispy Fried chicken

This used to be a nice place. No longer. The food is pretty bad..the service is dismal..
 I went there after one year.. and would never go there again ...

This is a family favourite. Have been brought up on the food here.  Lovely chilly beef,  prawn pepper salt,  crispy fried wantow,  manchow soup and pan fried noodles!  It is on the pricey side but a good place for family!

My girlfriend and I visited Fujiyama on a Saturday night. And they were packed!  it is a beautiful restaurant with a great ambience.  We were seated rather quickly. It took the waitress a little while to come and take our order. After waiting for our order for over an hour we asked the waitress if we can get it to go. It was brought out minutes later.  If the wait wasn’t so long I’d give this place five stars.

The sushi on the other hand was absolutely amazing!  We ordered five separate rolls and each one was better than the last.

This place is definitely a five-star restaurant but when they get packed on the weekends it is crazy.

We will definitely be going back to Fujiyama in the future but next time we’ll get our order to go.

Great place for a special lunch.  Food is always amazing, staff is friendly and helpful.  Some visits may have been better then others but that has nothing to do with the food.  I really love the ambiance of the place.. you get a great feeling when you walk in and it all makes for s great dining experience.  😋

I went here for my grandmother's birthday and we had the best night! The staff is so kind and I believe the manager personally sang happy birthday to her. I recommend anyone to come here if they have the time.

Fujiyama is a fun place to go with a crowd. For the past several years my niece has selected this hibachi restaurant as her go to place for a birthday party that includes family and close friends. The chef does his best to entertain guests with a little cooking show. Although I can't help but think he is laughing at us peasants as he tosses food in the air to catch in your mouth. The food is okay. Veggies, rice and shrimp are always good. Meat usually gets to dry and is not tasty. I guess that's why you get lots of sauce. The place is a bit loud so can be a challenge to hear even the person next to you. But not bad for a once a year gathering.
japanese food and the setting here is great. I like it here, great food & service. Fast, efficient, and courteous service. The bill won't break you.

Never again!!

Delivery took more than 2 hours.
The "groentenmix" suppose to be tempura vegetables, but contained prawn tempura (my wife is allergic to it) and there was a hair in the Yaki Udong Tori Teriyaki.....

All in all a real disappointment.
Super lekkere sushi, zowel om af te halen of om thuis te laten bezorgen. Regelmatig wat besteld altijd goed. Ze zijn snel!

Wij bestellen, of halen altijd af bij sakura als we thuis sushi gaan eten. Elke keer opnieuw weer top service. Sushi smaakt ons elke keer weer voortreffelijk en altijd z'n 45 min bezorgtijd. Zelfs vandaag op 2e kerstdag, wanneer er iets mis ging met onze bestelling, kregen we netjes een nieuw product. (Terwijl dit niet nodig was!) Het is dat ik nooit cash in huis heb, anders had ik zeker wat fooi als bedankje erbij gedaan! (Sorry daarvoor 🙈) Tot de volgende bestelling :)
Goede sushi kwaliteit. Stond op tijd klaar. Minpunt dat een blikje drinken niet was meegeleverd.
De beste sushi van Apeldoorn en heel veel keus in wat je wilt eten. Komen wel altijd later bezorgen dan je besteld en dat is wel teleurstellend. Maar heerlijk!

This is a lovely coffee shop with some healthy and delicious food options. Their coffee are delicious and staff and really pleasant. They also have free WiFi which is a bonus for the on-the-go salesman like myself. Oh. And they have couches too if you feel like relaxing while dining here. Prices are very reasonable too 😊

Loved this little resturant so much! Waitrons are so friendly, food is amazing and coffee is incredible. All cakes and sweet treats are made fresh and look divine!

Definitely will go back!
Very good service with friendly staff.  Bar one and red velvet cake were both delicious.
Good value for money. We like the sunday toast.

Brilliant freshly ground coffee. I havent eaten here. Wonderful environment for 1 on 1 meetings. Complete with several comfy couches for relaxing while reading or working. Free fast wireless internet too.
